about_the_game:
Important:

• If you already have the Churchill Mk. VI, you will receive 3,000 gold in compensation

This bundle includes:

• Churchill Mk. VI Premium tank (U.K., heavy, Tier VI)
• Garage slot
• 9 equipment slots
• Deep Scars Epic camouflage
• 10 Rare Combat XP boosters
• 10 Rare Free XP boosters
• 20 Rare Credit boosters

The Churchill Mk. VI is perfect for urban warfare and offensive support. Thanks to its good HP amount, solid frontal armor, and fast-firing 75 mm gun, this tank can provide effective cover fire for its allies.

This DLC bundle can only be added to your World of Tanks Blitz account once.
